title: durgaalakshmee saraswati
language:
Tamil


Click to view in: Tamil
sahitya:
durgAlakSmi sarasvati tuNaiy aDi paNivAyE manamE







anupallavi


svargApavarga inbam taruvAL shruti pughazh navarAtriyil uLLanbODu




caraNam


mur pirappugaLil sheivinai ozhiyum mOhamudal aru paghaigaLum  azhiyum
porppuyar mangaLa dIpam viLangum pugazhoDu magizhvum vAzhvil tulangum
